column1: Maud is spending her vacation among the woods and mountains of Maine
column2: where she went with her father and mother about two weeks ago.One very pleasant morning papa said
column3: "I think we had better take a ride this morning." So Maud was called in to get ready; and Hannah
column5: was harnessed into the buggy.The buggy had but one seat: so mamma found a nice box
column6: and folded her shawl and put on it; and that made a good place for the little girl
column7: between her father and mother; and they all started on their ride.They went along a shady road near the river
column8: and soon they saw some geese. Several of them were swimming in the water
column9: and one or two were on the bank. One of these had a sort of frame around its neck
column10: and was standing on one leg.
